description.en: View MultiversX network economics and market data. Get current EGLD price, market capitalization, total supply, circulating supply, total staked amount, annual percentage rate (APR) for staking, and top-up rewards information. Track economic metrics and staking rewards across the network.
description.de: Zeige MultiversX Netzwerkökonomie und Marktdaten. Erhalte aktuellen EGLD-Preis, Marktkapitalisierung, Gesamtversorgung, zirkulierende Versorgung, insgesamt gestakten Betrag, jährliche prozentuale Rendite (APR) für Staking und Top-up-Belohnungsinformationen. Verfolge Wirtschaftskennzahlen und Staking-Belohnungen im Netzwerk.

output.EGLD_PRICE_FORMATTED: transform:() => parseFloat(results.EGLD_PRICE || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2 })
output.MARKET_CAP_FORMATTED: transform:() => { const cap = parseFloat(results.MARKET_CAP || 0); return cap >= 1e9 ? `$${(cap / 1e9).toFixed(2)}B` : cap >= 1e6 ? `$${(cap / 1e6).toFixed(2)}M` : `$${cap.toLocaleString('en-US')}`; }
output.STAKED_FORMATTED: transform:() => { const staked = parseFloat(results.STAKED || 0); return staked >= 1e6 ? `${(staked / 1e6).toFixed(2)}M EGLD` : `${staked.toLocaleString('en-US')} EGLD`; }

success.en: EGLD Price: {{EGLD_PRICE_FORMATTED}}, Market Cap: {{MARKET_CAP_FORMATTED}}, Staked: {{STAKED_FORMATTED}}, APR: {{APR}}%
